</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets progress position of a progress bar ([[CT_PROGRESS]]). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''progressSetPosition''' pos </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - progress bar control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Number]] - 0: no progress; 1: full progress </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[progressSetPosition]] 0.5</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[with]] [[uiNamespace]] [[do]] {
	bar = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscProgress", -1]; 
	bar [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,1,0.01]; 
	bar [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
	bar [[progressSetPosition]] 0.75; 
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
